items.title: Web Development
items.details: Design and develop web applications with python, django, javascript and react. Also deploy in various clouds like AWS, digital ocean or any linux machines.

items.title: CI/CD pipelines
items.details: Implementation continues integration and delivery for the projects by setting up pipelines. Create pielines in AWS through codepipeline or deploying applications through github actions.

items.title: Monitoring
items.details: Setting up monitoring for infrastructure, track application health. Creating alerts and alarms on infrastructure failure / overload. Alerts for errors and application failures or any critical events.

items.title: Automation
items.details: Process automation, automate daily activities, implement automated health checkups. Also setting up automated error reporting, handling event triggers (scheduled/unscheduled).

items.title: App Development
items.details: Deign and develop android applications using flutter and integrating them with google firebase. Using firestore and firebase authentication and storing user data in firebase.

items.title: Sanket Vyapari
items.subtitle: Senior software Engineer
items.details: Have a solid foundation in web development, demonstrating proficiency in key technologies such as AWS, Python, Django, PostgreSQL, JavaScript, and React. Will be able to architect and implement scalable solutions in a cloud environment, particularly on AWS with services like EC2, S3, Lambda, and RDS, has significantly contributed to the success of multiple projects.
